price: (O gün) üzlər (əbədi) Yaşayan, yaratdıqlarının Qəyyumu (olan Allah) qarşısında zəlil görkəm alacaq. Günaha batanlar isə ziyana uğrayacaqlar.
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
